dialog.speaker: Carlos
dialog.english: Hi, what's your name?

dialog.english: Hi, my name is Sofía. And you?

dialog.speaker: Lucía
dialog.english: Hey! How’s your day going?

dialog.speaker: Lucía
dialog.english: What are you studying?

dialog.speaker: Mateo

dialog.speaker: Andrea
dialog.english: Long time no see! How have you been?

dialog.spanish: ¡Qué gusto verte! He estado bien, ocupado con el trabajo.
dialog.english: So nice to see you! I've been good, just busy with work.

dialog.speaker: Andrea
dialog.spanish: Sí, te entiendo. Yo también he estado muy ocupada.
dialog.english: Yeah, I get it. I've been very busy too.

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: ¿Te gustaría tomar un café esta semana y ponernos al día?

dialog.speaker: Andrea
dialog.spanish: Claro, me encantaría. ¿El viernes está bien?
dialog.english: Sure, I’d love that. Is Friday okay?

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.english: Perfect. I'll text you later.

dialog.speaker: Isabel
dialog.spanish: Bueno, ya me tengo que ir.

dialog.speaker: Tomás
dialog.spanish: Está bien, fue un placer hablar contigo.
dialog.english: Alright, it was a pleasure talking to you.

dialog.speaker: Isabel
dialog.spanish: Igualmente. Que tengas un buen día.

dialog.speaker: Tomás
dialog.english: Take care. See you soon.

dialog.speaker: Isabel
dialog.english: See you later.

dialog.speaker: Emma
dialog.english: Good morning! Did you sleep well?

dialog.speaker: Nico
dialog.english: Yes, thank you. And you?

dialog.speaker: Emma
dialog.spanish: Más o menos. Hacía mucho calor anoche.
dialog.english: So-so. It was really hot last night.

dialog.speaker: Nico
dialog.spanish: Sí, el clima ha estado raro últimamente.
dialog.english: Yeah, the weather's been strange lately.

dialog.speaker: Emma
dialog.english: Well, have a great day!

dialog.speaker: Nico
dialog.english: Thanks, you too.
